document.full_text: steven a. cohen's $13 billion fund firm is facing scrutiny from u.s. regulators but in a rare public appearance on wednesday the hedge fund manager said he has no plans of quitting what he loves doing.
document.title: sac's cohen faces pressure but sticks with investing
lines_and_colors: steven a. cohen's $13 billion fund firm is facing scrutiny from u.s. regulators but in a rare public appearance on wednesday the hedge fund manager said he has no plans of quitting what he loves doing.
